Thanks to Jozz, Mango, Jakesandobal, Zedther and Dylan (I'm sorry if I missed your name, so many people helped that I can't remember them all, just tell me and I'll be sure to add you.) Heres some screenies xD

replies.body:
You should never cover a monument with a block that isn't transparent, use glass, glass panes or iron bars instead.
How do you defend your monument if I put ladders on your pillar up to the monument and slowly climb up behind?
You shouldn't use pressure plates on the bottom either, it takes just a second to destroy a pressure plate and pillar up to your monument. You should use slabs instead, wooden slabs if you have the possibility to do it.
How do you stop me from destroying two crafting benches while I'm shifting, on your wall of crafting benches?

No, this was not a good way to defend your monument, especially not the best way as some people said. I'm pretty sure someone who skybridges (EricV4 xD) would destroy the monument easy too.
